portfolio.title: DirectDialogue
portfolio.description: A peer-to-peer multi-party chat application developed in Java incorporating a hybrid P2P architecture to form a scalable and fault tolerant messaging platform.

portfolio.title: StockCEO
portfolio.description: Stock tracking bot developed in Python using the discord.py API wrapper, allowing users to view & select stocks to track and set alerts for when said stocks reach a set price.

portfolio.title: Live to Eat
portfolio.description: Creation of a cookbook website using the Ruby on Rails framework. Allows users to view and post different recipies, with the ability to rate each others meals.
